callflow_dialog.title: Send This Call to Callflow
callflow_dialog.instructions: Select the callflow to send this call to.

transfer_dialog.title: Transfer This Call
transfer_dialog.instructions: Select the user to transfer this call to.

blacklist_dialog.futureCallsBlocked: Future calls from this number will be rejected.
blacklist_dialog.removalHelp: To remove the block, use the Callflows app (or contact your account administrator).

help.title: Switchboard - Help
help.helptext: Retrieve a parked call by clicking the red panel, the slot number, or the caller name/number.
help.pickupMasquerade: You cannot pickup a call when you are masquerading and not actually a user in the account.
